column4: I'm having some problems with ubuntu losing my dvd drive ...it lost it last night when I tried to play a movie (Totem) and when I put the system back on Vista it came back ...I understand there is a command line string that might help me, but I have no clue what to do. Can someone help me out?
if you're talking about enabling DMA.. i've not had to do that, geez, since edgy.
i asked you a question, are you referring to enabling DMA?
I'm not really sure what to tell you ...BLUSH. I'm not sure exactly where to go with this issue
